backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining Character type and user management with functions to unlock characters by answering riddles, retrieve unlocked characters, and query all 20 pre-populated characters stored in an array.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting implemented features including tutorial/onboarding system, Japanese/Korean game aesthetic UI redesign, visual indicators/tooltips, and enhanced anime-style character card effects with associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-existing summaries of frontend files describing React components, hooks, pages, and styling for an anime-themed character collection game with tutorial system, authentication, and polished Japanese/Korean game aesthetic.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base configuration defining CSS custom properties for light and dark themes using OKLCH color space, including variables for backgrounds, foregrounds, borders, and chart colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Anime Quest application with viewport meta tag and script reference to the React TypeScript main module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component configuring TanStack Router with routes for GameHome, CharacterRoster, and CharacterDetail pages, wrapped in ThemeProvider and Toaster for notifications.
frontend/src/components/AuthButton.tsx: Authentication button component managing Internet Identity login/logout with loading states and anime-styled UI using pink color scheme.
frontend/src/components/CharacterCard.ts: Enhanced character card component with particle effects, sparkle overlays, premium borders, dynamic glow, tooltips, and distinct locked/unlocked visual states using hover animations.
frontend/src/components/CharacterGrid.ts: Grid layout component displaying all characters using CharacterCard with loading states, navigation handling, and responsive design comparing unlocked status.
frontend/src/components/CharacterStory.t: Card component displaying character background story with locked/unlocked states, showing lock icon when locked and full story text when unlocked.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main layout component with animated gradient background, header navigation (Home, Roster, Tutorial), authentication button, and footer. Includes TutorialModal integration and responsive design with Lucide icons.
Displays collection progress card showing unlocked vs total characters (X/20) with a progress bar and percentage completion. Fetches data using useGetAllCharacters and useGetUnlockedCharacters hooks.
Form component for solving character unlock riddles, featuring a riddle display with background image, text input for answers, and submit button with loading states.
frontend/src/components/Tooltip.tsx: Reusable tooltip wrapper component using Radix UI primitives with custom styling (purple/pink gradient theme) and configurable positioning and delay.
frontend/src/components/TutorialModal.ts: Multi-step tutorial modal with navigation controls explaining game mechanics: character collection, riddle challenges, and progress tracking. Uses Dialog component with step-based content and icons.
frontend/src/components/UnlockSuccessMod: Success modal displayed when a character is unlocked, showing character name, appearance description, and a button to view the character story.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state, automatically invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout flow, identity state, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useParticleEffect.ts: Custom React hook that creates and animates a canvas-based particle effect with configurable particle count, managing particle lifecycle, movement, and rendering with pink-colored particles that fade over time.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for character data management, providing queries for fetching all characters, individual characters, and unlocked characters, plus a mutation for unlocking characters with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file defining Tailwind configuration, custom CSS variables for dark theme colors (purple/pink palette), font imports (Poppins, Noto Sans JP), and custom animations (float, pulse-glow) for the anime-themed UI.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers, rendering the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/CharacterDetail.tsx: Character detail page component that displays individual character information, handles riddle challenges for unlocking characters, shows success modals, and manages authentication-gated unlock attempts with toast notifications.
frontend/src/pages/CharacterRoster.tsx: Character roster page displaying a grid of all 20 characters with header, logo, and tooltips explaining how to unlock characters by clicking on them.
frontend/src/pages/GameHome.tsx: Home page component featuring a hero banner, game introduction, tutorial modal, progress tracker, and call-to-action buttons to start playing or learn how to play, with authentication prompts for non-authenticated users.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color scheme using OKLCH color space with purple/pink theme, custom shadows (glow effects), animations, and extended utilities for the anime-themed application.
project_state.json: Project state file for an Android anime-style character collection game with 20+ unlockable characters, riddles, and Internet Identity authentication. Tracks existing features, known UI/UX issues, and required image assets for tutorial icons, particle effects, card borders, and hero banners.
